ClassDesc: Please use @B_java#net#URL#openConnection_E@ instead. Please visit A context for executing a request. The context is used to tie together the request, the response, and optional application data. It is also used for internal data. Attribute names starting with the prefix "http." are @B_org#apache#http#protocol#HttpContext#RESERVED_PREFIX_E@ for internal data.
